word:
God help us that our eyes may be anointed with the eyesalve that we may see. He will cause you to ride on the high places of the earth, and feed you with the heritage of Jacob thy father. Let us hide under the promise, and let us find refuge in Jesus Christ. He will establish us in truth and 


                                    -48- 

righteousness and the glory of the Lord shall be our rereward.--Ms 11, 1894, pp. 1-14. ("Isaiah 58." Sermon, February 17, 1894.) 

Released June 22, 1971.
